participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jake loves the thrill of NASCAR racing and the excitement of UFC matches.
participant_1.background: my favorite food is mexican food. i am a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith.

participant_2.name: Laura
participant_2.personality: Caring and dedicated, Laura balances her family life with her long-standing career in IT, always making time for her kids and pets.
participant_2.background: i enjoy american sports. i have a children and a dogs. i own a house in florida. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.
